value.title: NJ Devils owners replacing Trump Organization as Wollman Rink operator
value.excerpt: The owners of the New Jersey Devils and two partners have been selected to run Wollman Rink in Central Park after the city booted its long-term operator, the Trump Organization.

value.title: QAnon influencers received press credentials to Trump rally: report
value.excerpt: QAnon influencers were givenÂ official press credentials to former President Donald Trump's rally in Florida this past weekend, suggesting a continued acceptance by the ex-president's organization toward the conspiracy theory.

value.title: J.D. Vance walks back Trump criticism after launching Senate bid
value.excerpt: After officially launching his campaign, Vance told Tucker Carlson that he did not fit into the establishment or Trumpian wings of the GOP.

value.title: Trump-endorsed House candidate Max Miller raises $550,000 in second quarter between campaign and victory fund
value.excerpt: Former Trump aide Max Miller, who is mounting a primary challenge to Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, raised more than $550,000 in the second quarter of 2021, his campaign told Fox News.

value.title: Donald Trump Feared Ghislaine Maxwell Citing Him in Epstein Case: Book
value.excerpt: "Has she said anything about me?" said Donald Trump according to Michael Wolff's latest book "Landslide: The Final Days of the Trump Presidency."

value.title: The stimulus helped these Trump voters pay rent and bills. But they blame it for a range of economic ills.
value.excerpt: In Ohioâs Appalachian region, people agree their stimulus money went to good use. But they also criticize the program for the worker shortage and rising inflation.

value.title: Pence got 10 minutes to talk about 'how hard he was working' during weekly lunches before Trump turned on the TV and began complaining, book says
value.excerpt: Michael Wolff wrote in his new book that Donald Trump wondered how Mike Pence "could be such a 'stiff' and a 'square.'"

value.title: Trump is asking random Mar-a-Lago visitors to recommend lawyers to help with his legal issues, Wolff book says
value.excerpt: An excerpt from Michael Wolff's new book says that Trump has begun to cast around among his Mar-a-Lago visitors for legal recommendations.

value.title: Trump-Endorsed Greg Abbott Gets GOP Challenger for Texas Governor. Who Is Allen West?
value.excerpt: West said "the sovereignty of Texas" is at risk from illegal immigration, and he's interested in going after banks laundering money for drug cartels.

value.title: Clyburn: Trump could be called to testify before Jan. 6 panel

value.title: Mike Lindell Promises 'Cyber Symposium' on Election Fraud Will 'Change History,' Reinstate Trump
value.excerpt: "These three days in August are gonna change historyâ¦you can't change these packet captures, they're forever captured in time."

value.title: Pro-Trump social media app hacked on launch day as half million sign up
value.excerpt: A social media site launched on Sunday by Jason Miller, a senior adviser to former U.S. President Donald Trump, was briefly hacked, and more than 500,000 people have registered to use the site, Miller said.

value.title: Bill O'Reilly: Pelosi & Cheney Team Up Against Trump On January 6 Commission
value.excerpt: Pelosi "rammed through" a select committee on January 6... & appointed Liz Cheney to it, reports Bill O'Reilly. "Why? The FBI is already doing it." "What a colossal waste of money," he said.

value.title: Trump rails against âterribleâ NY prosecutors, criminal charges at rally
value.excerpt: Former President Trump came out swinging against the New York prosecutors who brought criminal charges against his organization.

value.title: Walmart, AT&T and Pfizer back lawmakers who supported Trump election fraud lies 6 months after Capitol attack
value.excerpt: Dozens of companies said they'd stop donating to lawmakers who objected to Biden's election victory. Six months later, they are funneling cash to PACs

value.title: Team Trump's conservative GETTR app looks suspiciously like Twitter
value.excerpt: GETTR's home screen, posts, and user profiles look similar to Twitter's, whose exile of Trump fueled the right's belief that tech is targeting them.

value.title: Donald Trump Blasts Radical Left for Trying to 'Cancel' July 4 Holiday
value.excerpt: At a rally on the eve of the holiday, the former president vowed that the country's founders "will never be purged from history or canceled from our hearts."

value.title: Trump rails against âprosecutorial misconductâ during Florida rally
value.excerpt: The former president brought a MAGA-style rally to Sarasota, where he derided the indictments as "prosecutorial misconduct."

value.title: Donald Trump Compares New York Tax Fraud Charges to a 'Communist Dictatorship'
value.excerpt: "It's unprecedented, unheard of and totally unacceptable in America for prosecutors to run for office on a promise to get their political enemies," Trump said.

value.title: 'Absolutely No Doubt' Donald Trump Is Running for President Again, Says Steve Bannon
value.excerpt: "The MAGA movement, the America First movement is more engaged, more energized," said the former Trump administration official.

value.title: 'We need you to stop the counting': Records detail intense efforts by Trump allies to pressure Maricopa County supervisors
value.excerpt: New records reveal the behind-the scenes efforts by Trump,Â Rudy Giuliani, and state GOP Chair Kelli Ward to pressure Maricopa County supervisors.

value.title: Nightmare Scenario review: Trump, Covid and a lasting national trauma
value.excerpt: Yasmeen Abutaleb and Damian Paletta of the Washington Post show how bad things got â and how they could have been worse

value.title: Supreme Court upheld Trump's 'Big Lie' in Ariz. voting laws ruling, Latino group says
value.excerpt: The Latino civil rights group MALDEF said the Supreme Court's decision upholding Arizona voting restrictions accepted the false narrative of voter fraud.

value.title: A top Senate Republican credits the Trump tax cuts for June's huge jobs gains and the economy 'roaring back after a virus interlude'
value.excerpt: A nonpartisan government scorekeeper partly attributed the fast economic rebound to Biden's stimulus. Chuck Grassley says it's four-year-old tax cuts.

value.title: Clay Travis dismisses 'nothingburger' charges against Trump Org CFO: 'This is the best they can do'

value.title: Trump riddles followers with strong message: âWho shot Ashli Babbitt?â
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump fired off a message to his followers that asks for the cop who fatally shot a woman during the Capitol Building siege.

value.title: Eric Trump Says He, Don Jr. and Ivanka Lead 'Nice, Clean Lives'
value.excerpt: Donald Trump's son also attacked the current president's son, Hunter Biden, for allegedly paying for a prostitute and smoking crack in 2018.

value.title: Trump exposed as prosecutors make first move in high-stakes chess game
value.excerpt: The charges against Allan Weisselberg might seem small fry, but the threat to people higher up the food chain is mounting

value.title: Trump, fighting to toss out subpoena, offered to give House Democrats peek at financial statements
